Title: Dr. Death’s next victim could have been his nurse: police
Content: The Satara police on late Wednesday confirmed they were probing three more missing persons cases which may have been linked to ‘death doctor’ Santosh Pol, who has confessed to killing six people, incl
Author: Shoumojit Banerjee
